name: Adventeer
tag_list: travel, travel-blog, travel-journal, travel-maps, interactive-map, travel-news
overview:
Adventeer.com presents powerful ways of showing which countries, cities and places you have been and for creating beautiful travel journals for people on the go. The site also features news from the world of travel, adventure, exploration and more.

On Adventeer.com you can create your own interactive travel maps to show off the countries you have been and the cities and places you have visited. You also get travel statistics of where in the world you have been.

You can create powerful and great looking travel journals wherein you can blog about your travel experiences. You can easily add video, pictures and maps to your journals. Besides this you can off course share them with friends and family.

Adventeer.com also features interesting news and interviews relating to travel, adventure and exploration.
